channel.title: Resume on Chris Short
channel.description: Recent content in Resume on Chris Short

item.title: Résumé or Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Christopher Short Professional Summary Seasoned, passionate, results producing DevOps professional; wide range of experiences and skills managing numerous aspects of Linux systems (RedHat/CentOS), network administration, IT Operations, and Development Operations. Coordinated multiple projects with competing priorities involving WAN/LAN and systems design, implementation, configuration, hardening, administration, and maintenance. Expertise in troubleshooting hardware, software, and network issues in high-pressure situations. Prolific blogger, DZone and opensource.com contributor, Triangle DevOps organizer and speaker, and speaker at DevOpsDays Detroit 2016.
